title: How to Make a Font Smaller in Microsoft Word

steps.title: Go to the top of the page to see the font size dropdown.
steps.content: Go to the top of the page to see the font size dropdown. It's at top-right of Fonts section in Home tab. It is usually set to 12.

steps.title: Click the down arrow next to the font size dropdown.
steps.content: Click the down arrow next to the font size dropdown. You should see a list of numbers.

steps.title: Select a number less than twelve.
steps.content: Select a number less than twelve. This make the font smaller as you type.
